thread.title: Time Warner Inc. to Report First-Quarter 2018 Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Time Warner Inc. to Report First-Quarter 2018 Results
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Time Warner Inc. (NYSE:TWX) will report its first-quarter 2018 results on Thursday, April 26, 2018, before the market opens. The earnings press release will be available on Time Warnerâ€™s website.
Due to the pending merger with AT&T, Time Warner will not hold a conference call for investors in connection with the issuance of the earnings release.
About Time Warner Inc.
Time Warner Inc., a global leader in media and entertainment with businesses in television networks and film and TV entertainment, uses its industry-leading operating scale and brands to create, package and deliver high-quality content worldwide on a multi-platform basis.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180410005135/en/
